configs.special: -- ---------------------------- -- Table structure for t_card_user -- ---------------------------- CREATE TABLE `t_card_user` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `cardActivityId` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `charId` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `exchangeRecord` text, `gotDayReward` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `gotTotalReward` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lastScoreTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `todayScore` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `totalScore` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `cardActivityId` (`cardActivityId`), KEY `charId` (`charId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
